channel.title: Projects on Andrew
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Andrew

item.title: Check
item.description: I created Check in the summer of 2011, and maintained it until its retirement in 2019.

item.title: CurlBook
item.description: From its release in 2009 to its retirement in 2018 CurlBook was the premier curling coaching software for iOS, used around the world by national teams, including Curling Canada.

item.title: Festivus Grievances
item.description: A silly app for iOS, iPadOS, and watchOS used to keep track of all the ways you’ve been disappointed by the people in your life.
